name: Where Squirrels Go When They Dream
name_original: Where Squirrels Go When They Dream
description:
Spring. Fresh nuts and dreams. 🐿️

But this dream ain't like the others. No, the Winter Minions have other plans ...

Gather 'em nuts, build and don't let the cold win!

Your goal is to gather nuts and stop the cold minions from turning the entire world into a winter landscape. You can carry/throw nuts and place trees or other useful buildings. (+flowers🌼)

Multiplayer experience in a persistent world - Anything you plant/build will stay until the world freezes or the squirrels win. There is one world for everyone that joins the game  - work together to win :-)

Recommended: Voice chat during gameplay

Parrot Games
